column1: Marriage rates by age group for men and women, 2003 and 2013

column2: Number of men marrying per 1,000 unmarried men in age group
column4: Number of women marrying per 1,000 unmarried women in age group

column1: 1 These figures show the number of men/women marrying per 1,000 unmarried men/women in the age group (marriage rates by age).
2 Marriage rates take account of changes in the size of the unmarried population by age group which will affect the number of marriages taking place each year.
